tool_description: Analyzes control premiums from transaction data to determine appropriate adjustments when applying transaction multiples to minority interest valuations.

transaction_premiums.description: Historical control premiums from comparable transactions

transaction_characteristics.description: Characteristics of transactions (industry, size, type, etc.)

target_deal_type.description: Type of transaction or valuation context

industry_category.description: Industry category for more targeted analysis

error_messages: Insufficient premium data: Need at least 3 control premiums for meaningful analysis.
Data format error: Transaction premiums must be numeric values representing percentage premiums.
Invalid deal type: Specify a recognized transaction type like 'strategic_acquisition', 'financial_buyout', 'merger'.
Characteristics mismatch: Transaction characteristics array must match the length of premiums array.
usage: Provide transaction_premiums and transaction_characteristics arrays, specify target_deal_type, and optionally set industry and market contexts. Returns control premium analysis.

recommended_premium.description: Recommended control premium percentage for the target situation

premium_range.description: Range of appropriate control premiums (low, high)

analysis_summary.description: Summary of control premium analysis and rationale

confidence_level.description: Confidence level in the recommended premium (0-100)
